Name: Space Bees 太空蜜蜂
About the game: RougeLite + Aircraft Shooter, a thrill-based game, kill the incoming enemies, upgrade your fighters and continue to face the tidal wave of enemies. Various models choose to fight [/] Players can unlock all fighters for free when they meet the conditions. There are a variety of fighter options. Control those cool fighters to compete with the enemy! Let's have a nice flight More than 10 wingmen [/] As a fighter with auxiliary combat power, wingmen can choose their favorite powerful wingmen for different collocation, and can upgrade them through combat, showing amazing combat power and quickly eliminating waves of enemy planes that attack you. Defeat those enemies who flood in Upgrade more than 20 skills [/] In addition to the main fighter can upgrade life, defense, attack speed, bullet enhancement, etc., it can also strengthen other combat effectiveness and passive gain effect of the fighter, so as to increase the combat effectiveness. Gold coin shop [/] During the battle, gold coins will be dropped. After picking them up, they will enter the store for extraction to see if the goddess of luck cares for you?
